$interpreted: Frightened Commoner: Oh my Snake God! Where did these monsters...wait...these-these aren't monsters!?
Terrified Commoner: Help!!! Don't...don't eat me!!!
Diana: Protect the people!!
Lizard Soldier: Yes, ma'am!
Sophie: Children are the circus' most loyal customers. Whoever dares bully my customers in front of me better watch out!
Diana: Our first priority is to get all the people out safely. As long as we can get them outside the wind barrier, they won't be attacked by these creatures.
Diana: We don't have much time, take them to the passage.
Lizard Soldier: Yes, your Majesty!
Lizard Soldier: Hey you, follow us this way!
Lizard Soldier: Follow the group ahead and don't lag behind!
Lizard Soldier: Gotta move faster, the creatures are closing in fast!
Diana: I know it's a little late for a "thank you"...but thank you for what you are doing for this nation.
Diana: I'm not going anywhere, but I've got to direct some soldiers to help destroy the pond of lights.
Lizard Captain: ...Your Majesty, we don't have enough lizard power...
Lizard Captain: We'll deal with that later. You stay here. If anything happens to you...
Diana: For now, this is all we can do.
Diana: Don't worry. I murdered my own flesh and blood to become Queen. This country and I aren't as weak as some would have you believe.
Lizard Captain: ...Your Majesty...
Sophie: Morgan's Marvelous Circus, gather 'round. The ringmaster has something to say.
Ru-yi: What is it?
Hanbei: ...This can't be good.
Sophie: Don't say that——the mission's changed!
Sophie: Starting now, we're helping Queen Diana!
Diana: Miss Sophie, you...
Sophie: Your Majesty, don't be fooled by our lowly appearances; we're the best, most agile members of Morgan's Marvelous Circus.
Sophie: With our help, we can save a lot more people!
Hutchinson: Sophie is right, we'll be a big help.
Hanbei: No way! We're already dealing with enough!
Diana: Thank you for your assistance, Miss Sophie.
Sophie: Okay! Everybody, let's get to it! Let the Morgan's Marvelous Circus performance begin!
Rune: Sophie wants to help the Queen...and I do too.
Sophie: No. You've got to take Clark and them to break the pond of lights. Only you know where it is.
Rune: But, I'm worried about you...I don't want us to separate.
Sophie: Rune, us circus performers aren't the best of fighters. Even if we went, we wouldn't be much help.
Sophie: But here, we can help a lot of people.
Rune: ...I can fight. So I must go.
Sophie: You got it. That's what I wanted to say~ We've all got to do what we're best at.
Sophie: That way...we won't regret a thing.
Sophie: Rune!
Sophie: Remember to stay alive, that way we can see each other again!
Rune: Stay alive...
Rune: ...so we can meet again. Sophie, too. Promise.
Sophie: It's a promise.

Model.Text: Oh my Snake God! Where did these monsters...wait...these-these aren't monsters!?
Help!!! Don't...don't eat me!!!
Protect the people!!
Yes, ma'am!
Children are the circus' most loyal customers. Whoever dares bully my customers in front of me better watch out!
Our first priority is to get all the people out safely. As long as we can get them outside the wind barrier, they won't be attacked by these creatures.
We don't have much time, take them to the passage.
Yes, your Majesty!
Hey you, follow us this way!
Follow the group ahead and don't lag behind!
Gotta move faster, the creatures are closing in fast!
I know it's a little late for a "thank you"...but thank you for what you are doing for this nation.
I'm not going anywhere, but I've got to direct some soldiers to help destroy the pond of lights.
...Your Majesty, we don't have enough lizard power...
We'll deal with that later. You stay here. If anything happens to you...
For now, this is all we can do.
Don't worry. I murdered my own flesh and blood to become Queen. This country and I aren't as weak as some would have you believe.
...Your Majesty...
Morgan's Marvelous Circus, gather 'round. The ringmaster has something to say.
What is it?
...This can't be good.
Don't say that——the mission's changed!
Starting now, we're helping Queen Diana!
Miss Sophie, you...
Your Majesty, don't be fooled by our lowly appearances; we're the best, most agile members of Morgan's Marvelous Circus.
With our help, we can save a lot more people!
Sophie is right, we'll be a big help.
No way! We're already dealing with enough!
Thank you for your assistance, Miss Sophie.
Okay! Everybody, let's get to it! Let the Morgan's Marvelous Circus performance begin!
Sophie wants to help the Queen...and I do too.
No. You've got to take Clark and them to break the pond of lights. Only you know where it is.
But, I'm worried about you...I don't want us to separate.
Rune, us circus performers aren't the best of fighters. Even if we went, we wouldn't be much help.
But here, we can help a lot of people.
...I can fight. So I must go.
You got it. That's what I wanted to say~ We've all got to do what we're best at.
That way...we won't regret a thing.
Rune!
Remember to stay alive, that way we can see each other again!
Stay alive...
...so we can meet again. Sophie, too. Promise.
It's a promise.
